SEARCH
Module com.example.quizCoach
Package com.example.quizCoach.database

Class MockQuizDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.quizCoach.database.MockQuizDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IQuizDAO
public class MockQuizDAO extends Object implements IQuizDAO
Mock implementation of IQuizDAO that stores quizzes in memory for testing purposes. This class maintains an in-memory list of Quiz objects and simulates auto-incremented IDs.

    • updateQuiz

      public void updateQuiz(Quiz quiz)
      Updates an existing Quiz in the in-memory list. Finds the Quiz by its ID and replaces its data.
      Specified by:
      updateQuiz in interface IQuizDAO
      Parameters:
      quiz - The Quiz with updated information.
